data.text:
Has your passion always been for the four wheels and for unique and timeless cars? Our Ferrari Test Drive & Lamborghini Museum & Factory Day Trip From Milan will give you the fantastic opportunity to realize your dreams!

Ferrari Test Drive, Museum & Factory Day visit Trip From Milan

The Ferrari Museum in Maranello also offers visitors exclusive shuttle bus tours along the Viale Enzo Ferrari boulevard in the factory complex. and to the Fiorano track

A museum guide will also discuss the various characteristics of the Ferrari track where the Prancing Horse has carried out all its competition and road car tests since 1972. Likewise the Ferrari Campus, the heart of the complex where all the Prancing Horse cars are built. The buildings and facilities designed by world-leading architects of the likes of Renzo Piano, Massimiliano Fuksas, Jean Nouvelle, Marco Visconti and Luigi Sturchio are also fascinating. Equally interesting is the historic part of the factory which has been meticulously preserved, not least the factory entrance which dates back to 1947.

Visitors must remain on the bus at all times throughout the tour, and both photography and videoing are prohibited.

Ferrari Factory visit in Italy, has to be booked well in advance.

Ferrari Test Drive & Lamborghini Museum & Factory Day Trip From Milan

What are you waiting to realize your wish of a life?

Don’t waste time! Now you have the chance to try it on your skin, speeding up the track: drive a wonderful Ferrari on a real racetrack!

The circuit of Fiorano in Italy, is used today as an experimental track for Ferrari sports and GT cars. The track extends across more than 3 kilometers, with 14 curves and a chicane. Its shape is not casual, but it follows the characteristics of several European autodromes. A telemetry system provides all the information required to optimize the cars. A closed-circuit television system with 10 fixed cameras records the entire run of the car being tested. In addition, the racetrack is equipped with a special irrigation system that wets the track in just a few minutes, where then most of the water on the asphalt can be recuperated.

Ferrari factory visit in Italy includes the tour of the track by shuttle.

This amazing experience includes a visit to the Lamborghini complex, the birthplace of the most prestigious and sought-after super sportscars!

You will enjoy the Lamborghini Museum, admiring the most representative models of this legendary automobile company, and then explore one of the most advanced manufacturing facilities in the world: the Lamborghini Factory!

Highlights

Feel the rush of driving a Ferrari or a Lamborghini on an actual racing track!

Admire the most representative models of the legendary Lamborghini automobile company in the official Lamborghini Museum

Visit the birthplace of the most prestigious and sought-after super sportscars: Lamborghini Factory Tour

BOOK THIS TOUR NOW

Ready to test drive a Ferrari or a Lamborghini?

Itinerary

After the pickup in your Milan hotel, you will reach one of the available tracks in the “Land of Motors”, also knows as Italian Motor Valley.

This is a special small area in the Emilia Romagna region in Northern Italy, which is famous worldwide thanks to its most prestigious super sport cars manufacturers: Lamborghini, Pagani, Ducati, Ferrari are all based here.

You will know which track you will drive your Ferrari on only after your booking , as the availability of the racetracks for private test drives is subject to races schedules and they are often closed to the public. But don’t worry: we will find the right track for your exciting test drive!

All of the tracks we can offer you, such as Maranello racetrack, or the newly open Modena circuit, are real racing tracks with thrilling bends, fast straits and undulating gradients, pit lanes and fully equipped paddocks.

Once arrived to the racetrack, you’ll experience the thrill and excitement of the world’s greatest cars.

A short theoretical briefing will help you to have a correct driving of the vehicle.

After that, you will board the supercar of your choice: Ferrari or Lamborghini, the choice of the model to drive is wide and you will get to choose your favorite model after your booking.

Then, sit behind the wheel of this incredibly powerful vehicle. Start the engine, feel the roaring sound and go!

At first you will gain confidence driving your Ferrari or Lamborghini with an assistant at your side that will allow you to discover the deepest secrets of the beautiful Ferrari cars. Later, feel free to press the accelerator and enjoy this unique and exciting driving adventure.

After this adrenaline-rich experience, you will have time to relax and taste a wonderful lunch in Modena.

In the afternoon, you will visit the Lamborghini complex, in the village of Sant’Agata Bolognese, outside Bologna, Italy.

The exclusive official Lamborghini Museum, inaugurated in 2001, is located inside the complex and hosts a number of incredible Lamborghini collectors’ cars, polished to a gleaming shine.

Admire vintage cars, race cars and concept cars such as 350 GT, Diablo, Miura, Countach, Espada, F1 single-seaters, Gallardo, Murciélago, Sesto Elemento, Reventón and the latest Huracán and Aventador.

You will also learn about the history of this legendary automobile company.

Your next destination will be one of the most advanced manufacturing facilities in the world: the Lamborghini Factory.

The tour inside the production lines will allow you to see cars such as Gallardo, Murcièlago and Aventador being assembled by the workers.

You will move through the first station of the production department, the assembly line of the Gallardo LP 560-4 or the handcrafted creation of a Murcièlago, the production line of the engines, and the upholstery department.
